statements: SELECT show_id, show_name, viewership_count, viewer_demographics FROM tv_show_viewership_data;
SELECT show_name, viewership_count FROM tv_show_viewership_data WHERE viewership_count > 100000;
SELECT * FROM tv_show_viewership_data WHERE show_id = '5f2c5591-279b-4d6e-9913-935150c650aa';
SELECT show_id, show_name, viewer_demographics->'age' AS viewer_age FROM tv_show_viewership_data WHERE viewer_demographics->'gender' = 'Male';
SELECT show_name, viewership_count FROM tv_show_viewership_data ORDER BY viewership_count DESC;
SELECT show_name, viewership_count FROM tv_show_viewership_data WHERE viewership_count > 1000
SELECT * FROM tv_show_viewership_data WHERE show_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT show_name, viewership_count, viewer_demographics ->> 'gender' AS viewer_gender FROM tv_show_viewership_data ORDER BY viewership_count DESC
SELECT show_name, viewership_count, viewer_demographics -> 'age_range' AS viewer_age_range FROM tv_show_viewership_data WHERE viewer_demographics IS NOT NULL
SELECT show_name, COUNT(*) AS total_viewers FROM tv_show_viewership_data GROUP BY show_name HAVING total_viewers > 5000
SELECT * FROM tv_shows;
SELECT show_name, genre FROM tv_shows WHERE release_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY show_name;
SELECT viewer_name, age, gender FROM viewership WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY viewer_name ASC;
SELECT show_name, genre FROM tv_shows WHERE genre IN ('Comedy', 'Drama') LIMIT 5;
SELECT viewer_name, show_name, viewing_date FROM viewership JOIN tv_shows ON viewership.show_id = tv_shows.show_id ORDER BY viewing_date DESC;
SELECT show_name, genre, release_date FROM tv_shows;
SELECT viewer_name, age, gender, viewing_date FROM viewership;
SELECT * FROM tv_shows WHERE genre = 'Comedy';
SELECT show_name, genre FROM tv_shows WHERE release_date <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT viewer_name, age, gender, viewing_date FROM viewership WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT show_name, viewing_date FROM TV_Show_Views;
SELECT viewer_name, show_name, viewing_date FROM TV_Show_Views WHERE viewer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM TV_Show_Views WHERE show_id = 3;
SELECT viewer_name, viewing_date from TV_Show_Views WHERE show_name LIKE 'Game%';
SELECT viewer_id, viewer_name FROM TV_Show_Views ORDER BY viewing_date DESC;
SELECT show_name, viewer_name, viewing_date FROM TV_Show_Views WHERE viewer_name = 'Alice' ORDER BY viewing_date DESC;
SELECT viewer_name, show_name, viewing_date FROM TV_Show_Views WHERE viewer_id = 12345 ORDER BY viewer_name;
SELECT DISTINCT viewer_name FROM TV_Show_Views WHERE viewing_date >= '2020-01-01';
SELECT show_name, viewing_date FROM TV_Show_Views WHERE viewer_id = 67890 AND viewing_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_views, show_name FROM TV_Show_Views GROUP BY show_name HAVING total_views > 5 ORDER BY total_views DESC;
SELECT * FROM Viewers;
SELECT show_name, genre FROM TV_Shows WHERE genre='Comedy';
SELECT show_name, release_date FROM TV_Shows ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT viewer_name, age, gender FROM Viewers WHERE age < 25;
SELECT viewer_name, show_name, rating FROM Viewership INNER JOIN Ratings ON Viewership.viewer_id = Ratings.viewer_id AND Viewership.show_id = Ratings.show_id;
SELECT show_name, genre FROM TV_Shows ORDER BY show_id DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT viewer_name, age, gender FROM Viewers WHERE age > 20 ORDER BY age ASC
SELECT * FROM Viewership WHERE viewing_date >= '2022-01-01' AND duration_minutes > 30
SELECT show_name, genre, release_date FROM TV_Shows WHERE genre = 'Comedy'
SELECT viewer_name, gender, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM Ratings JOIN Viewers ON Ratings.viewer_id = Viewers.viewer_id GROUP BY viewer_name, gender
SELECT * FROM TV_Shows;
SELECT show_name, genre FROM TV_Shows WHERE viewership_count > 1000;
SELECT viewer_name, age, gender FROM Viewers ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT show_id, viewer_id, rating FROM Viewership_Data WHERE rating >= 4.5;
SELECT genre_name, COUNT(show_id) AS total_shows FROM Shows_Genres GROUP BY genre_name;
SELECT * FROM TV_Shows ORDER BY show_name ASC;
SELECT show_name, genre, viewership_count FROM TV_Shows WHERE genre = 'Drama';
SELECT show_name, genre, viewership_count FROM TV_Shows WHERE viewership_count > 100000 ORDER BY viewership_count DESC;

SELECT V.viewer_name, V.age, V.gender, S.show_name, VD.rating, VD.date_watched FROM Viewers V JOIN Viewership_Data VD ON V.id = VD.viewer_id JOIN TV_Shows S ON VD.show_id = S.id WHERE V.age > 30 AND VD.rating > 4.5;
SELECT SG.genre_name, COUNT(S.id) AS show_count FROM Shows_Genres SG JOIN TV_Shows S ON SG.show_id = S.id GROUP BY SG.genre_name ORDER BY show_count DESC;
